122120090-d-12-21-09-SNJX.Narrative: ON MONDAY, DECEMBER 21,2009 AT APPROXIMATELY 0921 HOURS, TRAIN #229, LRV 3510, REPORTED STRIKING THEBUCKET OF A FRONT END LOADER NORTH OF 36TH STREET STATION RESULTING IN THE DERAILMENT OF THE LRV. TRAIN #229 WAS A SINGLE UNIT CONSIST, PROCEEDING SOUTHBOUND (RAILROAD DIRECTION) UNDER PERMISSIVE SIGNAL INDICATION, WITH THIRTY-FOUR (34) PASSENGERS ON BOARD. THE FRONT-END LOADER, WITH A SINGLE (PERSON) OCCUPANT, WAS STRUCK BY THE (A) END OF CAR 3510 ON THE DRIVER'S RIGHT CORNER OF THE RAISED BUCKET. THE FRONT END LOADER WAS OPERATED BY A SNOW REMOVAL CONTRACTOR IN A PUBLICLY ACCESSIBLE ROADWAY.THE FRONT END LOADER SLIPPED ON ICE AND TRAVERSED THE ROADWAY CURB RESULTING IN ITS FOULING THE ROW.THE TRAIN OPERATION APPLIED AN EMERGENCY BRAKING AND STRUCK THE FRONT END OF LOADER AT A SPEED OF 4MPH. THERE WERE NO (0) INJURIES REPORTED BY THE LRV OPERATOR, THE FRONT END LOADER OPERATOR OR THE34 PASSENGERS ONBOARD THE TRAIN. THE LRV SUSTAINED DAMAGE TO THE BODY FRAME/STRUCTURE, WINDSHIELD, WHEELS, PLOW AND TRUCK ASSEMBLY. THE FRONT END LOADER SUSTAINED MINOR DAMAGE TO THE CORNER OF THE BUCKET (SCRATCHES). DAMAGE ESTIMATES ARE $150,000. THIS INCIDENT WAS REPORTED TO THE NRC-REPORT #926813.

I0309-d-12-04-09-PATH.Narrative:
AT 1555 HOURS ON FRIDAY, DECEMBER 4, A NINE-CAR TRAIN WAS BEING MOVED ONTO TRACK 25.  THE TRAIN WASBEING OPERATED FROM EAST CAR 857 BY AN ENGINEER/SWITCHMAN.  ANOTHER ENGINEER/SWITCHMAN WAS FLAGGINGFROM WEST CAR 878.  THERE WERE EIGHT STANDING CARS OCCUPYING TRACK 25 AT THE TIME THE MOVE WAS BEINGMADE.  AS THE TRAIN MOVED ONTO TRACK 25, CAR 878 COLLIDED WITH STANDING CAR 869.  AS A RESULT OF THIS REAR END COLLISION, THE CONTACT FORCES PUSHED THE EIGHT STANDING CARS 9 FEET  3 INCHES WEST ON TRACK 25.  ALL 17 CARS SUSTAINED UNDERCARRIAGE AND/OR CAR BODY DAMAGE AS A RESULT OF THE COLLISION.THERE WERE NO INJURIES ASSOCIATED WITH THIS INCIDENT.     

CED REPORTED THAT CARS 826-725-879-666-884-625-890-869 WERE OUT-OF-SERVICE CARS THAT WERE STATIONED ON TRACK 25.  CAR 621 WAS BEING MOVEDINTO THE MAINTENANCE FACILITY FOR A PI INSPECTION.  CARS 878-672-680-861-112-639-691-857 WERE ALL IN-SERVICE CARS THAT WERE BEING SHIFTED TO MAKE UP TRAIN CONSISTS.  AN EXAMINATION OF ALL CARS INVOLVED IN THE COLLISION REVEALED THAT ALL BRAKE CUT-OUT VALVES WERE CUT-IN.  THE ELECTRO-PNEUMATIC AND PNEUMATIC BRAKING SYSTEMS WERE FUNCTIONING ON THE NINE CARS THAT WERE BEING MOVED ONTO TRACK 25.

AFIELD INSPECTION WAS CONDUCTED ON TRACK 25 ON MONDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2009.  THE INSPECTION REVEALED 9 FOOT  3 INCH SKID MARKS ON BOTH RUNNING RAILS OF TRACK 25.  THESE SKID MARKS WERE FOUND UNDER EACH TRUCK OF THE EIGHT STANDING CARS, INDICATING THAT THESE CARS WERE PUSHED THIS DISTANCE WHEN CAR 878 C

OSRR109DR-d-12-04-09-OSRR.Narrative:
ON 12/04/09 AT APPROXIMATELY 02:30 TRAIN THRX-03 WAS SPOTTING 24 LOADS WITH 2 LOCOMOTIVES. THE LEADLOCOMOTIVE WAS OHCR4602. THEY WERE SHOVING IN A NORTHBOUND DIRECTION INTO REHOBOTH SIDING AT REHOBOTH, OH.  THERE WERE NO INJURIES HOWEVER THERE WAS TRACK AND CAR DAMAGE.

UPON ARRIVAL TO THE SCENE,IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE 1ST THROUGH THE 7TH CAR OF THE CONSIST FOR A TOTAL OF 7 CARS WERE DERAILED CARS INVOLVED IN STANDING ORDER FROM HEAD END: AWXX 4037, AWXX 4103, TLAX 1172, TLAX 1093, TLAX 1441, TLAX 1443 AND TLAX 1438. 

IT HAS BEEN DETERMINED THAT THE B END R1 WHEEL OF TLAX 1443 WAS THE FIRST WHEEL DERAILED TO THE INSIDE OF THE LOW RAIL AFTER THE SPREADING OF THE GAUGE AND ALLOWING THE RAIL TO ROLL AND THE OTHER 6 CARS TO DERAIL. 

TRACK MEASUREMENTS SHOWED 5 OF REVERSE ELEVATION, THE GAUGE HAD BEEN SHOVED OUT AROUND 2  AND THAT THE TRACK HAD BEEN BUCKLED APPROXIMATELY 6 INCHES. THIS WAS ALL WITHIN -62 OF THE POD. ALL OTHER TRACK MEASUREMENTS WERE GOOD. THE RAIL AND TIESARE VERY GOOD AS THIS TRACK IS NOT VERY OLD. WE FEEL THAT THE CONSTANT CONTACT BEARINGS WERE HAVINGDIFFICULTY TURNING THROUGH A LEFT HAND TURNOUT, A SHORT RIGHT HAND TURN AND THE A LEFT HAND TURN. THE 5 OF REVERSE-ELEVATION WITH THE CONSTANT CONTACT BEARING TRUCKS FORCE THE GAUGE TO WIDEN THUS RESULTING IN THE DERAILMENT. 

ROOT CAUSE: SATURATED SUB GRADE
